api_overview.cost: Free tier for non-commercial use, affordable commercial plans

injury_reports.value_proposition: Real-time injury status - critical for dynasty evaluation
injury_reports.fantasy_impact: High - injury updates directly affect player values
injury_reports.current_limitation: Basic text descriptions, but roadmap includes enhanced reporting

player_stats.note: May duplicate what you already get from Sleeper API

game_logs.fantasy_impact: Medium - supplements your existing game log data

roster_updates.value_proposition: Official roster changes and depth chart updates
roster_updates.fantasy_impact: High - feeds directly into your Roster Shift Listener system

weekly_games.fantasy_impact: Low - ESPN and other free sources provide this

high_value_features: Injury reports - crucial for dynasty evaluation
Roster updates - would automate your Roster Shift Listener
Official depth chart data - affects target competition analysis
medium_value_features: Player statistics - duplicates Sleeper but could provide verification
Game logs - supplements existing data sources
low_value_features: Schedules and scores - easily available elsewhere
Team standings - not critical for dynasty focus

roster_shift_automation.implementation: Replace manual monitoring with MSF roster endpoints
roster_shift_automation.benefit: Turn reactive system into proactive automated monitoring

injury_tracking.implementation: Feed MSF injury data into dynasty tier adjustments
injury_tracking.benefit: Real-time injury impact on player valuations

data_verification.implementation: Compare MSF vs Sleeper for data quality assurance

cost_benefit_analysis.value_proposition: Strong if injury reports and roster automation justify cost
cost_benefit_analysis.recommendation: Test free tier first, evaluate automation benefits

reasoning: Injury reports would significantly enhance dynasty analysis
Roster automation aligns perfectly with existing Roster Shift Listener
Complements rather than duplicates existing Sleeper integration
suggested_approach: Set up free tier access with existing MSF credentials
Focus on injury reports and roster updates endpoints
Evaluate data quality vs existing sources
Make commercial decision based on automation value
